de.intarsys.pdf.pd
Interface IAdditionalActionSupport

All Known Implementing Classes:
PDAcroFormField, PDAFButtonField, PDAFChoiceField, PDAFIntermediateNode, PDAFSignatureField, PDAFTextField, PDAnnotation, PDAnyAnnotation, PDCircleAnnotation, PDDocument, PDFileAttachmentAnnotation, PDHighlightAnnotation, PDInkAnnotation, PDLineAnnotation, PDLinkAnnotation, PDMarkupAnnotation, PDPage, PDPolygonAnnotation, PDPolylineAnnotation, PDPopupAnnotation, PDSquareAnnotation, PDSquigglyAnnotation, PDStampAnnotation, PDStrikeOutAnnotation, PDTextAnnotation, PDTextMarkupAnnotation, PDUnderlineAnnotation, PDWidgetAnnotation
public interface IAdditionalActionSupport

A PD object that supports additional actions. Additional actions are actions associated with a variety of trigger events.
